content.p: You’ve graduated (congratulations!), and everyone is asking you what’s next. So, whether you’ve got no idea, or you know where you’re heading and you just need a little help getting there, this section will direct you to useful resources and plenty of practical advice. Advice on how to generate career ideas and choose the right one for you Advice on routes into graduate jobs and finding vacancies in the UK and overseas Advice on CVs, interviews and assessment centres to help you ace the recruitment process Expert advice on searching and applying for jobs within and outside academia telephone: +44 (0) 115 951 3680 fax: +44 (0) 115 951 3679 email: careers-team@nottingham.ac.uk
